website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced unit that will work well for someone just starting out with a dovetail jig.
pros: Basic unit that's relatively easy to use for hobbyists
Kit includes everything you need to start using the dovetail jig immediately
Steel base provides plenty of stability to the unit
Many different thicknesses of wood will fit
cons: Only includes one template, which limits the types of cuts you can make

customer_reviews.title: Works good but has major flaw in offset setting
customer_reviews.text: Initial setup takes awhile while you realize the offset gauge isn't set to 1/2" like it should be, the stamped/bent piece is inaccurate. When searching for the problem, I found posts from back in 2002 stating there were problems with the offset gauge, you would think in 18 years they could have fixed the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff624

customer_reviews.title: Better design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to replace my old porter dove tail jig. The set up on the router set up on the ild jig was so time consuming that I had to keep a dedicated router for it. The new jig has a set up gauge built right in saving much time and one less router in the shop. Thanks for making something better made than the old one, something that is seldom done these days.
customer_reviews.author: James Hovind

customer_reviews.title: Easy of use
customer_reviews.text: I recently built new cabinets for my kitchen and wanted to make them the way they used to build cabinets. Now adays they are not made very well which is why I wanted to build my own. I had an old jig that was hard to set up and had seen better days. I built them out of oak wood so I didn't want to waste any if at all possible! I'm glad I bought this jig. It stands up to the name and was affordable. I will get years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sawdust girl

customer_reviews.title: Not a complete kit
customer_reviews.text: This is not the complete kit. It only has one blind dovetail template. They should let you know this is not the deluxe kit. I know. I know I should read more closely. But give me a break... Now I have to find and buy more accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great jig!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the easiest jig that I have ever used! I have a Leigh jig and trying to get it setup for half blind dovetails is ridiculous, so I bought this for half blind dovetails and it excels at easy setup. I made a drawer with this after 30 minute setup. I have been watching a video on setup before purchasing it so I was kinda familiar with it sort of. If you want to do halfblind dovetails order this jig!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well if you learn the jig and learn its weak points (I wish the guide stops were made better and more material and contact with the jig - for how important they are for making it work) I’ve made dovetails with this that have no mistakes but it’s all about patience and precision. It’s all about perfect square boards and clamping them squarely before you cut 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Levi A. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and use. if you follow the directions and double check as you go, the results are great!! well built. Only thing I wish I had done was to buy the 4212 so I could do through dovetails and pins too. The good thing is that you can buy the template to upgrade the 4210.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Pingel

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad jig
customer_reviews.text: Good jig for the price but when you make something to do more than one thing, you’ll find it doesn’t do either very well. So the templates are cut up in various ways, on both sides etc and what this does is make the baseplate weaker and easier to bend. To get very good dovetails, the system needs to be flat and stable which isn’t possible when all the metal is cut away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ortolano

customer_reviews.title: Lots of slop.
customer_reviews.text: To much slop in setup, the fit and accuracy of parts leave a lot of play, very hard to get consistant results. You need to make many trials and only use one side of jig.
customer_reviews.author: J.  R. P.

customer_reviews.title: but does come with a good router
customer_reviews.text: doesn't come with some necessary parts for different joints, but does come with a good router bit
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jig
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these for the last 5 years, before moving my shop, of which I then sold it. I used it daily, building hundreds of Amplifier cabinets with it and except for one time, where I broke a bar support bolt because I was in a hurry, it never let me down. And it IS very simple to use. Just takes a little common sense, and previous wood working experience. I recently bought a new one since I sold the last one, and I am certain it will withstand my use and abuse again for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mcmurray

customer_reviews.title: Nice jig
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I disliked but you still need to pay close attention to alignment of work pieces to get consistently accurate dovetails
customer_reviews.author: BobK

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable got this one right!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the "cheapie" versions of dovetail jigs before, and even took the time to "re-engineer" them with "cam clamps" but the wood would still slide around after the retaining bar bent from clamping on one end only. I have wanted one of these for a long time, and love every dime I spent on this model. Setting the router-bit depth is a first time every time built-in' feature. Dovetails have been called the 200 year joint and are easy to make with the right equipment--so why curse yourself later for building a crummy box or drawer?
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for one thing.....
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and great dovetails. I'm still trying to figure out how to make a few adjustments. The depth of pocket for the pins is a bit deep, so when the drawer is assembled, the joint is exposed on the inside corners of the box by a little over 1/16". Nothing in the manual tells me how to adjust for that. It's not a show stopper, but all the other dovetail drawers I've made don't have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R. Clot Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of Porter Cable stuff, this does one thing and does it really well. I love the guide for adjusting the bit depth. The unit grips the work pieces quickly and securely, and with a couple quick adjustments you can start cranking out perfectly fitting dovetails. With this setup, the dovetail is actually the quickest and easiest joint I make, and that's pretty fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Armandeaux

customer_reviews.title: This jig worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: This jig worked great for me. I think the YouTube video is much better help than the instructions but works better than the cheap ones. Don't make the same mistake I did, buy this one first or you will own both and the cheap one will collect dust.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell V.

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: I had a Leith dovetail jig that I could never master. Wanted a jig to do half blind dovetails and this fit the bill very nicely. I did devote a couple hours - slow learner - and scrap wood to get it learn how to use it. Work perfectly, no slippage, no mess up. Would recommend it to anyone with limited patience.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Great dovetail jig
customer_reviews.text: Great dovetail jig! This is my first dovetail jig and it is worth every penny. Do read the instructions and watch some videos online first. One suggestion I would make is cut your drawer bottom dado first and use it to align the pins and tails so that dado doesn't show when the drawer is put together. Other than that I had a nearly perfect drawer on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cheap version from Harbor F and had to return it because of the lack of accuracy. this wone is an awesome Jig. Worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: ran a test set and got great results right away
customer_reviews.text: Set it up today, ran a test set and got great results right away. I've struggled with lesser dovetail jigs that are much, much more difficult to set up properly and us! Porter Cable got it right with their easy set up features!!! Very nice addition to my workshop. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: The Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Requires subtle adjustments. Suggest many trial cuts before you ...
customer_reviews.text: Requires subtle adjustments. Suggest many trial cuts before you do the real thing. Watch online videos to get it just right.
customer_reviews.author: Mavrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool! Once you get the hang of it, dovetails are a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: Love this jig
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, nice joints. Very pleased with purchase. Instructions for dovetail tenon could be improved. Other than that, awesome tool.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Powderhorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and makes nice, tight-fitting dovetails. This unit is very well built and easy to use. The instructions were very clear which is especially welcome given the many, many poorly written/illustrated instructions from products imported from Asia.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Comes with a heavy duty router bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Well spent money. Takes time to get used to it but results are paying off. Test before you start building boxes. Love it! Comes with a heavy duty router bit which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, instructions not great, but very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are a little hard to follow...but YouTube has videos that explain use. Very well built product. I made my first dovetail jointed build as soon as it arrived. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: j gary

customer_reviews.title: a good jig.
customer_reviews.text: this jig works real well if you follow directions close! a good jig.
customer_reviews.author: Herman harrison

customer_reviews.title: Even though i had to return this product due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though i had to return this product due to a warped guide i give it 5 stars because i purchased one else where and stepped my game up to making dovetail drawers with such ease
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine Great Price
customer_reviews.text: very good machine simple yet accurate Be careful starting and stopping. I got a little close starting and knicked it up with the router. Def a good machine and great price on it
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence D

customer_reviews.title: I used this jig to make my first through dovetail ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this jig to make my first through dovetail box. It takes some getting used to to set up, but when you get the hang of it, it makes very clean dovetails.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works as every other Porter Cable product I've used over the decades.... perfect. Does full dovetails as well as half-blind dovetails. Complete with 1/2" dovetail bit and collar that fits Porter Cable router bases.
customer_reviews.author: Keith P

customer_reviews.title: it worked great and the new drawer is much stronger than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I built a new junk drawer for the kitchen as the old one was falling apart. it worked great and the new drawer is much stronger than the old one. It was packed well and it is easy to use. I just watched a video on u-tube.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Scribner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! I've never use a device that operates as ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I've never use a device that operates as easily and professionally as this one does! This thing is great!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID HAMLETT

customer_reviews.title: but after that good products like drawer boxes can be made
customer_reviews.text: It will take a while until you figured out how to use it, but after that good products like drawer boxes can be made.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Dovetails look good enough to
customer_reviews.text: Medium level woodworker. Skimmed through instructions then whipped out a practice box in less than 10 minutes. Dovetails look good enough to sell
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Ray

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Being used to porter cable's bigger jig, I was pleased to the ease of use for this little guy. I only use it for half-blinds, so no promises for the other types. The clamping is much easier to adjust, and it was a lot faster to get set up initially. The offset guide is nice to be in one piece, but hard to not get slightly crooked as you tighten it.
customer_reviews.author: Hemialha

customer_reviews.title: WELL DONE PORTER-CABLE
customer_reviews.text: Great product works great if u take the time to read the instructions book before you start your job
customer_reviews.author: john garrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like always, porter cable makes some of the best tools out there
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good online deal, much cheaper than Home Depot/ Lowe's. Haven't used yet, though tool seems very sturdy and is made well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn P

customer_reviews.title: Dovetail Jig
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and high quality. Works exactly as advertised. I am an experienced woodworker, but not a veteran dovetail maker. I found the set up a little fussy, but once you get it right it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Van

customer_reviews.title: great jig
customer_reviews.text: great item, I use this to make drarws and nothing beats it, easy to use came complete with 1/2 " shank dovetail bit. I would not expect anything less from a Porter Cable product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Took a few tries to get to know the settings on it. Good piece of equipment, nicely built should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Buckshot

customer_reviews.title: Nice dove tail jig
customer_reviews.text: So far after about an hour of getting the feel of it i made 4 boxes with dove tails on every corner. They all look great.
customer_reviews.author: FoolMeOnce

customer_reviews.title: The right and left adjustments have one alien screw for ...
customer_reviews.text: The right and left adjustments have one alien screw for tighten it down and it swings. Can not get right and left even.
customer_reviews.author: glendon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its grate and precise. Thank you for such a product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make great drawers
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that i didn't buy the complete jig. Very easy to use right out of the box. Watched a youtube video first. Will be paying the extra for the rest of the templates! Using it to make kitchen drawers and pull out shelving.
customer_reviews.author: HD Maintenance

customer_reviews.title: Not for idiots
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how to set it up you will really enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: san juan bob

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Well Built Jig
customer_reviews.text: Well built, quality dovetail jig. Make sure you have a template guide adapter for router!

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy. I really love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy. I really love this thing. I only took a couple of times to try it out before I was ready to make my drawers
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: TD520
customer_reviews.text: This dovetail jig worked just fine. Take your time with it to dial everything in and you will get great results.
customer_reviews.author: TJD

customer_reviews.title: Porter cable dovetail
customer_reviews.text: Works great,but make sure you do test pieces.bit depth has to be right on

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: should of purchased the full setup, setup not the easiest but take care and quality does follow
customer_reviews.author: Ed Sudbury Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I'm a handiman and this is perfect for what I need it for. Gets the job done every time.
customer_reviews.author: michael hanson

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I have now used this jig several times. Setup is straignt forward. Once set I have found the jig very accurate. The dovetailing bit that is supplied does a good job. I have owned 2 other dovetailing jigs and really never was able to repeat accurate dovetails. This Porter-Cable jig is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mleggo

customer_reviews.title: I can finally dovetail
customer_reviews.text: This jig has finally enabled me to dovetail successfully. It is strong and easy to use with clear instructions to ensure good, attractive joints.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hoftiezer

customer_reviews.title: dove tail jig
customer_reviews.text: this is one great jig easy to set up and the dove tails come out perfect every time just take the time to set it up right
customer_reviews.author: edie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This tool is very user friendly. Instructions were understandable and to the point. I am a trial and error guy and even without looking at the instructions FIRST it didn't take long before I was making perfect drawers and boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good tool being a perfectionast took time and a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tool being a perfectionast took time and a lot of practice to get it right been using dovetails for a long time better then my old brand. Delivered in three days reg delivery . Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: vince cugini

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't make a lot of dovetails. I have an Incra jig but i find the process tedious. I wanted a way to quickly and efficiently make half blind dt's for drawers. The learning curve on the PC is about 30 minutes. You can then probably put the instruction book away. There is an issue with the quality and unusual size of the Porter Cable bit. Whiteside has replacement bits and Freud will have them in March. Glad I bought it and would do it again
customer_reviews.author: mark weiss

customer_reviews.title: Fine Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have worked as a professional furniture /cabinet maker since 1980 and although this is not a professional tool I find the results to be more than adequate. My need was for a quick portable jig and this fits the bill. The initial results were excellent and my project is complete. Take care and go slow with the router, pay attention to your alignment and your results will be fine. I do own a professional jig for the shop and still hand cut many dovetails but for this job I have no complaints. Bottom line, I am very happy and will use this tool for many projects.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Needs more...
customer_reviews.text: Porter Cable makes AWESOME products, and this one is AWESOME, BUT... It needed the other Jig with it... This one has MINIMAL uses without the other jig... Spend the extra 80.00 and get the next higher version. I cut out the other jog on a water jet (for about $15.00) and now I have a ton more uses for it! But, I had to design it on a CAD program and spend the time and money to make the other jig... that costs a FRACTION of the other jig...
customer_reviews.author: HoopFam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product for the price - works exactly as described. Very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hanson

customer_reviews.title: dovetail
customer_reviews.text: product was set up and ready to use. makes great joints. highly recommend for this price you cant go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IF YOU HAVE A 1/4" COLLET!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You literally have to use the porter cable 17/32 bit for this to work at all. The problem is, you can't get this bit with a 1/4 shank. I searched and searched for the right bit so I didn't have to buy a new router. I ended up sending the jig back and buying one that takes a NORMAL 1/2" dovetail bit. I didn't give it 1 star because I really can't tell you if it works or not. I just think it's crappy to make a jig 1/32 different than all the rest so ppl have to use your bits. That kinda sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Bryanth60

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was on my son's wish list, so when I surprised him with it he was thrilled. It was exactly what he wanted; and I paid $40 less than where he had seen it.
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: dove tail jig
customer_reviews.text: came on time worked well,didnt have any problems setting up or using it based on included directions,would reccomend to a friend

customer_reviews.title: It does a fairly good job after setting it up but it is now ...
customer_reviews.text: The clamp screw broke with the first use. You can say that I over tightened it but when I tried to use it looser it wouldn't hold the board in place. It does a fairly good job after setting it up but it is now useless unless I use clamps to hold the board in place. Can not recommend it at all
customer_reviews.author: nmaf12672

customer_reviews.text: Came super fast. Step-father was blown away when he opened it for Xmas. PERFECT! It has been the perfect addition to his wood shop.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Precise and very versatile, still own the original jig from the early 80's

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's okay, but I was really hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's okay, but I was really hoping for a full through not a half through and the full through template is another $60.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself
customer_reviews.text: By not purchasing drawers anymore this jig has paid for itself. Better than expected all you need to do is get the hang of adjusting it.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome exactly what I needed top quality product I would recommended this product to anyone in th market for one

customer_reviews.title: have not used it yet
customer_reviews.text: Tis' a very sturdy piece. I am slowly working on a project and this is next in line. I expect the jig to perform perfectly. As you know there is always a little wiggle in accuracy when dealing with wood.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri A. Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I know, I know, I should have read the description better but hey, it says "Porter Cable 4210 12 Inch Dovetail Jig". Not "Porter Cable 4210 12 Inch half blind Dovetail jig". Anyone would assume you could do a full through Dove tail right? Ok probably not but just be aware of that fact. If you don't mind spending extra on full and mini full through dovetail jigs then the unit is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: not so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: not so easy to use. The manual requires a review, including better illustrations and explanations. Also, it is too heavy to be a portable tool

customer_reviews.title: is mine defected one?

product_meta.title: PORTER-CABLE Dovetail Jig, 12-Inch (4210)
product_meta.description:
Amazon.com Those who work with the 4210 rave about the user-friendly features. The jig's patented alignment lines and router bit depth stop simplifies set-up and gets you up and running in no time. This versatile jig accepts stock from 1/4 to 1-1/8 inch in thickness and up to 12 inches in width. Built with endurance in mind with its 1/8-inch a thick steel base, this jig includes ultra-durable CNC-machined aluminum templates for creating half-blind dovetails, dovetail dadoes, box joints, and miniature dovetails. The Porter-Cable 4210 includes a carbide-tipped dovetail bit, template guide, lock nut, and a easy-to-follow manual.

AMAZON.COM
Those who work with the 4210 rave about the user-friendly features. The jig's patented alignment lines and router bit depth stop simplifies set-up and gets you up and running in no time. This versatile jig accepts stock from 1/4 to 1-1/8 inch in thickness and up to 12 inches in width. Built with endurance in mind with its 1/8-inch a thick steel base, this jig includes ultra-durable CNC-machined aluminum templates for creating half-blind dovetails, dovetail dadoes, box joints, and miniature dovetails. The Porter-Cable 4210 includes a carbide-tipped dovetail bit, template guide, lock nut, and a easy-to-follow manual.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ideal for woodworking, furniture and cabinet making, the Porter Cable 4210 12-inch dovetail jig kit enables cutting a wide variety of joinery for drawers, boxes, and furniture in stock from 1/4 to 1-1/8 inches thick with a router (sold separately). The kit includes a template 4211 for half-blind, rabbeted half-blind, and sliding dovetails. The unit’s template alignment lines and intuitive router bit depth setting gauges deliver industry leading ease of set-up and enable depth settings without measurements. On-board instructions provide clear guidance while machined aluminum template provides superior cutting accuracy and long term durability. All bit needed to make joinery above are included. Ninety-day money back guarantee, 3 year limited warranty, 1 year free service contract.

See more
feature_bullets: Includes 4211 template for half-blind, rabbeted half-blind and sliding dovetails
Template alignment lines and router bit depth gauges allow for quick, easy set-up.Heavy-duty cam-type clamps with sandpaper-backed locking bars provide firm grip of wood
Router bit depth gauges allow user to quickly and accurately set the depth without taking measurements
Includes 4211 template for half-blind, rabbeted half-blind and sliding dovetails
Template alignment lines and router bit depth gauges allow for quick, easy set-up
Router bit depth gauges allow user to quickly and accurately set the depth without taking measurements
12-inch max stock width; 1-1/8-inch max stock thickness
On-board instructions provide clear user guidance for the various applications; Machined aluminum template provides superior cutting accuracy and long term durability
